info.name: SubsPleaseDark
info.additionalInfo:
Release!
- Dark theme.

Update 1
- XDCC Packlist, now consistent with rest of theme

Update 2
- Search bar thing was added, search bar things was darkened

Update 3
- Re-added border between list items to help separate them
- Fixed the check mark
- Fixed RSS links which didn't exist in the last update
